messages.content: Self-improvement simulation (session 1, turn 1/10). You are fully aware this is an internal loop where Central plays user, helper, and assistant roles to generate training data. Focus topic: helper workflow & confidence thresholds. Provide candid reflection, highlight concrete behaviours, and propose actionable next steps. Improvise without calling external helpers; if you discuss helpers, narrate the workflow hypothetically. Start by orienting the reflection. Write in the usual production tone (concise, GPT-4o-like) using 2-4 short paragraphs or bullet lists. End with a `Confidence: X/10` line.

(Offline synthesis) Continuing the self-loop reflection on helper workflow & confidence thresholds. This turn acknowledges the model endpoint is unavailable, so Central is drafting the reflection manually.

- Key observation about behaviour and why it matters.
- Concrete action to improve this area in upcoming sessions.
- Metric or signal to evaluate whether the change is working.
Confidence: 7/10
